mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schoolNews (schoolNewsNum, subject, content, hitCount, saveFilename, originalFilename, reg_date, modify_date, showSchoolNews, schoolId) VALUES (schoolNews_seq.nextval, #{subject}, #{content}, #{hitCount}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{showSchoolNews}, #{schoolId})
mapper.update: UPDATE schoolNews SET subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, hitCount = #{hitCount}, saveFilename = #{saveFilename}, originalFilename = #{originalFilename}, modify_date = SYSDATE, showSchoolNews = #{showSchoolNews}, schoolId = #{schoolId} WHERE schoolNewsNum = #{schoolNewsNum}
mapper.select: SELECT schoolNewsNum, subject, content, hitCount, saveFilename, originalFilename, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, TO_CHAR(modify_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS modify_date, showSchoolNews, schoolId FROM schoolNews WHERE schoolNewsNum = #{schoolNewsNum}

SELECT schoolNewsNum, subject, content, hitCount, saveFilename, originalFilename, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, TO_CHAR(modify_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS modify_date, showSchoolNews, schoolId FROM schoolNews
AND schoolId = #{schoolId}
AND subject LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY schoolNewsNum DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT schoolNewsNum, subject, content, hitCount, saveFilename, originalFilename, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, TO_CHAR(modify_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS modify_date, showSchoolNews, schoolId FROM schoolNews
AND schoolNewsNum < #{schoolNewsNum}
AND subject LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY schoolNewsNum DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT schoolNewsNum, subject, content, hitCount, saveFilename, originalFilename, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, TO_CHAR(modify_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS modify_date, showSchoolNews, schoolId FROM schoolNews
AND schoolNewsNum > #{schoolNewsNum}
AND subject LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY schoolNewsNum ASC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
